precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: No visible change will occur on the desktop.

precondition: The "Start" button is visible on the left side of the taskbar.
expected_results: The "Start" menu will expand, displaying a list of programs, folders, and system options, including "My Documents", "My Computer", "Control Panel", "All Programs", "Log Off", and "Turn Off Computer".

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open and visible over the desktop.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open in "Category View", obscuring the Start Menu.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open, displaying system configuration icons in Classic View.
expected_results: The focus will shift to the "Date, Time, Language, and Regional Options" icon.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the focus is on an icon.
expected_results: The focus will shift one icon to the right.

precondition: The "Add or Remove Programs" icon in the Windows XP Control Panel is visible.
action: Press the 'p' key and then the 'o' key.
expected_results: The tooltip will disappear and the focus will move to the "Phone and Modem Options" icon.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and the 'Address' bar is visible.
expected_results: No changes in the UI are expected.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the close button is visible in the title bar.
action: Click the close button in the title bar of the "Control Panel" window.
